**Bolt of Inaccuracy** is a level 3 [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations") spell, but as it's only available through a [rod of Inaccuracy](/Rod_of_Inaccuracy "Rod of Inaccuracy"), [Evocations](/Evocations "Evocations") determines its potency. It deals severe irresistible damage to anything it strikes, and has a range almost equal to your [line of sight](/Line_of_sight "Line of sight") that is unaffected by the number of targets it hits, but it can only reliably hit the least [evasive](/Ev "Ev") monsters in the game.

## Strategy

- Although this spell will miss its target often, its damage output is surprisingly high, especially at high Evocations skill. Considering that it costs you nothing except for a very small amount of [hunger](/Hunger "Hunger") and the half turn it takes to wield the rod, it is actually a very powerful (if situational) spell for any character willing to train the needed skill.

- [Sleeping](/Sleep "Sleep") or [petrified](/Petrified "Petrified") opponents are easy targets, and even if you miss, the spell produces such a small amount of noise that you're unlikely to wake a sleeping target up. Consider it a long-range equivalent to [Stabbing](/Stabbing "Stabbing"). Long lines of opponents in narrow hallways are also good targets; although you probably won't hit everything, you're likely to at least hit *something*.

- The following monsters have such lousy [EV](/EV "EV") that you should be able to hit them semi-regularly (not a complete list):

  - [Hydras](/Hydra "Hydra")
  - [Statues](/Statue "Statue")
  - [Curse skulls](/Curse_skull "Curse skull")
  - [Oklob plants](/Oklob_plant "Oklob plant")
  - Most [jellies](/List_of_jellies "List of jellies")
  - Most [eyeballs](/List_of_eyeballs "List of eyeballs")
  - Most [mummies](/List_of_mummies "List of mummies")
  - All [giants](/List_of_giants "List of giants")
  - [Bone dragons](/Bone_dragon "Bone dragon")
  - [Gold dragon armour](/Gold_dragon_armour "Gold dragon armour")-wearing [player ghosts](/Player_ghost "Player ghost")
  - [Gastronok](/Gastronok "Gastronok")

- Hitting your target with [Corona](/Corona "Corona"), [Sticky Flame](/Sticky_Flame "Sticky Flame"), or [Fedhas Madash](/Fedhas_Madash "Fedhas Madash")'s [Sunshine](/Sunshine "Sunshine") ability will significantly increase your accuracy against it, making it a much easier target. [The Shining One](/The_Shining_One "The Shining One")'s Halo [aura](/Aura "Aura") is even better, automatically highlighting almost everything on the screen.

- [Vehumet](/Vehumet "Vehumet") worshipers also enjoy improved use of this spell, as he increases Bolt of Inaccuracy's range to include your entire line of sight.

- [Nagas](/Naga "Naga") and [octopodes](/Octopode "Octopode") can [constrict](/Constriction "Constriction") opponents, dramatically reducing their EV. This greatly increases the odds of hitting with a bolt of inaccuracy.

## History

- Before the removal of [rods](/Rods "Rods") in [0.20](/0.20 "0.20"), this spell was available through the [rod of inaccuracy](/Rod_of_inaccuracy "Rod of inaccuracy").
- Prior to [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), this spell was available through use of a [tome of Destruction](/Tome_of_Destruction "Tome of Destruction").
- Prior to [0.12](/0.12 "0.12"), this spell was available in one of the [rods of destruction](/Rod_of_destruction "Rod of destruction").
- In the pre-DCSS days, this was actually found in the book of Greater Conjurations (which later became the [Book of Annihilations](/Book_of_Annihilations "Book of Annihilations")), as a level 4 Conjurations spell.
